TopicTitle: Is Quantum Struts working for YOU?

Articles.Content:
Quantum Struts work and don't work for me.

The "struts' (linear RCS ports) work just fine, but the EVA placement struts from the Quantum Strut Core (ASAS) does not seem to work. I keep clicking on "Activate" from the right click menu, but nothing happens. Taking a Kerbal up to it on EVA and right clicking does nothing.

They work fine for me in 0.20, when I learned how to use them.

The struts only show the blue line if they're attached to another part, be it KAS or a Docking Port.
